ektf2232.docs:
The `ektf2232` component allows using the touchscreen controller found in the [Inkplate 6 Plus](https://esphome.io/components/display/inkplate6.html) with ESPHome. The [I²C](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) is required to be set up in your configuration for this sensor to work.

*See also: [EKTF2232 Touchscreen Controller](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/ektf2232.html#ektf2232-touchscreen-controller)*

lilygo_t5_47.docs:
The `liygo_t5_47` touchscreen platform allows using the touchscreen controller for the Lilygo T5 4.7” e-Paper Display with ESPHome. The [I²C](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) is required to be set up in your configuration for this touchscreen to work.

*See also: [Lilygo T5 4.7” Touchscreen](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/lilygo_t5_47.html#lilygo-t5-4-7-touchscreen)*

display.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The display to use. If only one display is available, this can be omitted.

*See also: [Touchscreen Components](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#configuration-variables)*

on_touch.docs:
**[Automation](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#automation)**: An automation to perform when the touchscreen is touched. See [on_touch Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#touchscreen-on-touch).

*See also: [Touchscreen Components](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

touchscreen_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the touchscreen.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

x_min.docs:
**int**: Left coordinate of the screen area to be detected as the virtual button.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

x_max.docs:
**int**: Right coordinate of the screen area to be detected as the virtual button.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

y_min.docs:
**int**: Top coordinate of the screen area to be detected as the virtual button.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

y_max.docs:
**int**: Bottom coordinate of the screen area to be detected as the virtual button.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*

page_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Only trigger this binary sensor if the display is showing this page.

*See also: [touchscreen Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/index.html#id1)*
